jcr:content.jcr:title: List of political parties in Madagascar

contentheadline.headline: List of political parties in Madagascar

contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of Madagascar}} This article lists '''political parties in Madagascar'''. In [[Madagascar]], most of the constituencies elect one, some of them two, members of the national assembly. This means that the [[political party]] with most votes may get an [[absolute majority]] in the national assembly without an absolute majority of the votes. This system makes coalition governments less likely. ==The parties== <!--:''The general rule on naming applies. That means: the parties are named in the English translation and the original native name is placed on the first line of the article unless the native form is more commonly used in English than the English form. Rationale and specifics: See: [[Wikipedia:Naming conventions (use English)]]''.--> The parties are usually known by their acronyms. *AKFM - [[Party of the Independence Congress of Madagascar]] (''Antokon'ny Kongresy ho an'ny Fahafahan'i Madagasikara'') *AKFM/Fanavaozana - (''Antokon'ny Kongresy ho an'ny Fahafahan'i Madagasikara Fanavaozana'') *AREMA - [[Association for the Rebirth of Madagascar]] or [[Pillar and Structure for the Salvation of Madagascar]] (''Andry sy Rihana Enti-Manavotra an'i Madagasikara'') *AVI - [[Judged By Your Work Party]] (''Asa Vita no Ifampitsarana'') *[[FANORENANA]] *GRAD Iloafo - (''Groupe de réflexion et d'action pour le développement'') *HT - [[Hizb ut-Tahrir]] (''Hizb ut-Tahrir'') *LEADER-Fanilo - [[Economic Liberalism and Democratic Action for National Recovery]] *MFM - [[Activists for Madagascar Progress]] (''Mpitolona ho an'ny Fandrosoan'i Madagasikara'') *MONIMA - [[Madagascar for the Malagasy]] (''Madagasikara otronin'ny Malagasy'') or (''Mouvement nationaliste et indépendant de Madagascar'') *PFM - (''Parti fédéraliste de Madagascar'') *RPSD - [[Rebirth of the Social Democratic Party]] (''Rénaissance du Parti Social-Démocratique'') *RPSD-Vaovao - [[New Rebirth of the Social Democratic Party]] (Faction that left RPSD in 2003) *TIM - [[I Love Madagascar]] (''Tiako I Madagasikara'') *TGV - [[Tanora Malagasy Vonona]] (''Determined Malagasy Youth'') *TTM - (''Toamasina Tonga Saina'') ==See also== * [[Politics of Madagascar]] * [[List of political parties by country]] {{Malagasy political parties}} {{Africa in topic|List of political parties in}} {{Expand list|date=August 2008}} [[Category:Lists of political parties|Madagascar]] [[Category:Political parties in Madagascar| ]] [[Category:Madagascar politics-related lists|Political parties]] [[Category:Lists of organisations based in Madagascar|Political parties]]
